Question
========

Given is the following estimated logistic regression model: *Logit*[*P*(*y*=1)] $= 0.4+0.8x$.  

Calculate the odds of the probability of $y = 1$ as $x = 3$. 
Answerlist
----------
* 0.94
* 1.03
* 2.8
* 16.44

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
